regen.new_specification: The system shall allow administrators to configure alert thresholds for monitoring of resources.

regen.absent_element: configurable alert thresholds for monitoring resources
regen.new_specification: System shall support configuration of alert thresholds for monitoring resources, allowing customization per monitored resource.

regen.absent_element: timeliness of alerts delivered to recipients
regen.new_specification: Alerts shall be delivered promptly to all configured recipients
